emissions of their Scope 3, Use of sold products category.
This example illustrates that while there may not be any “off the shelf” biogenic CO2 emissions
for mobile combustion, it is possible to develop models and data that allows for their
measurement. However, developing an emission model and its associated data will depend on
the scope 3 category emissions being modelled and the specific facts and circumstances of the
company.
